snippet: Shimon Peres’s comments came amid a wave of speculation that Israel’s prime minister and defense minister were considering an attack.
abstract: Israeli Pres Shimon Peres speaks out against the prospect of a lone Israeli military strike on Iran's nuclear facilities, message that contradicts the hawkish, go-it-alone line emanating from Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu and Defense Min Ehud Barak.
lead_paragraph: Shimon Peres’s comments came amid a wave of speculation that Israel’s prime minister and defense minister were considering an attack.

headline.seo: Israel’s Peres Criticizes Talk of Unilateral Iran Strike
headline.main: Israel’s President Criticizes Talk of Unilateral Strike on Iran
headline.print_headline: Israel’s President Criticizes Talk of Unilateral Strike on Iran
